title: Virgil Quick Start
description: A brief introduction to using the Virgil extension
author: claude

overview.purpose: Get up and running with Virgil in 3 steps
overview.scope: Extension entry point and tree view

steps.title: Extension activates on walkthrough files
steps.description: Virgil activates when it detects any `*.walkthrough.json` file in your workspace. The activation event is defined in package.json.

steps.title: Tree view shows walkthrough structure
steps.description: The WalkthroughProvider parses the JSON and builds a tree view with the title, overview, steps, and summary sections.
notes: Current step is highlighted with a green arrow

steps.title: Navigate with keyboard shortcuts
steps.description: Use Cmd+Shift+] for next step and Cmd+Shift+[ for previous step. These keybindings are defined in package.json.
notes: Keybindings only active when a walkthrough is loaded

keyTakeaways: Create *.walkthrough.json files to define guided tours
Use the sidebar to navigate between steps
